summary: Adds a dialogue option to the Old Orc to recruit him as a follower.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a persuade dialogue option to the [url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Old_Orc]Old Orc[/url] (the one you encounter along the road and is looking for a Good Death) to recruit him a s follower, so he can find a good death when he joins you on your travels.

Unfortunately, I was unable to test this currently, as my current PC is a bit of a mess and bluescreens when I play Skyrim or any other game for longer than 15 minutes. As a result, this file is [b]highly experimental[/b], and may or may not work.

I also had to use some workarounds, as the "Old Orc" uses a leveled NPC list and therefor cannot get the unique flag, nor a relationship rank with the player. These will be reset to 0, when a game is loaded,
but at least a rank of 1 is needed to become a follower. So I used a script on game load, which sets the relationshiprank correct again.
